â…£. Experiments and Results ğŸŒº

âœ” Experimental setup

âœ” Baseline system

âœ” Hyper Parameter

  • Learning rate 0.0001
  • Adam Optimizer
  • Weight clipping -0.01 ~ 0.01 threshold ($ğ·_ğ‘¤$)
  • Batch size 128
